headline.main: Ernie Pyle Is Killed on Ie Island; Foe Fired When All Seemed Safe; FAMOUS WAR CORRESPONDENT TEN DAYS BEFORE HE MET DEATH

abstract: Killed, Ie Jima Is; biog; tributes; E Pyle Day noted; life story, GI Joe, film plans; por
snippet: GUAM, April 18--Ernie Pyle died today on Ie Island, just west of Okinawa, like so many of the doughboys he had written about. The nationally known war correspondent was killed instantly by Japanese machine-gun fire.

byline.original: By Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
